title: Bats57
author: Bats57
content: Selling my True Freedom Coins 10 000 (Truth) Bidding starts at 1.72 BTCif interested please reply with your Bid, True Freedom Coin public address and block explorer proof of payment. BTC Address:13by4RZYtjDLMZvCtgDeG3tzgr5xv9Wa1C

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Costs 0.0012399499999999999 USDT to get it from their site here: https://freedom-coin.com/buy

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on October 29, 2023, 11:35:22 AMCosts 0.0012399499999999999 USDT to get it from their site here: https://freedom-coin.com/buyThis does not seem to be the coin the topic author is suggesting. This coin has the FREE token symbol, and the topic author offers a coin with the Truth token symbol. I don't know what this coin is, I couldn't find any information about this coin. Can the author of the topic give a link to the description of the coin he is selling?

comments.author: CyberSkank
comments.body: Sorry to butt in, but the OP is try to undersell me as I am trying to sell the same amount of Truth but for 1.8 BTC. So If you buy from me instead of him I will bring my price down to 1.79 BTC.Here is my BTC wallet:13f8TGLVS1VhPYH62LMdYuvi6sVWyjfma6Regarding the info you requested about where to find TFC you mind find find use out of these links:https://ugetube.com/watch/what-gives-tfc-monetary-value_9ggRshubCZcwBH1.htmlYou can see my Original Bid here. I am TFC miner. https://truefreedomcoin.boards.net/thread/111/10k-truth-1-8btc?page=1&scrollTo=145

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: This shitcoin shouldn't even be worth 1 satoshi. I hope no one is foolish enough to trade off their valuable Bitcoins for this kind of garbage.Quote from: CyberSkank on October 29, 2023, 09:14:23 PMAnd what's a dollar worth? A government promise!? Lmao, if you are not going to bid why are you even on this thread? Go make auctions on your shitcoin's forum. Don't stress us here.

comments.author: CyberSkank
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 30, 2023, 10:15:48 PMThis shitcoin shouldn't even be worth 1 satoshi. I hope no one is foolish enough to trade off their valuable Bitcoins for this kind of garbage.Quote from: CyberSkank on October 29, 2023, 09:14:23 PMAnd what's a dollar worth? A government promise!? Lmao, if you are not going to bid why are you even on this thread? Go make auctions on your shitcoin's forum. Don't stress us here.Your comment is not in the spirit of Bitcoin culture. A shitcoin is a traditionally defined as a coin that had a premine. I want to encourage you to do some research before just calling a True Freedom Coin a shitcoin. True freedom coin is actually building on the foundation that Bitcoin and Litecoin set and aligns itself with Bitcoin's whitepaper. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5472277.msg63081088#msg63081088If you don't want to bid bid on my truth it's your free choice. But I have been to enough auctions to know that whens someone says something is worthless they want to see if you will come down on the price. I also think the OP's plan to undersell me is working against my favor here  Because I am not coming down any lower than 1.75 BTC....
